body:
#jQuery.pluginautoload ##Automatic plugin loading on html DOM jQuery.pluginautoload load your plugins on html DOM without javascript code. This plugin is same as dojo or jQuery mobile system. ##Author Marc Buils (marc.buils@marcbuils.fr) ##License LGPL v3 (http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.txt) ##Current version v0.1.0: First release ##Usation ```
```
name: Jquery.pluginautoload
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
